long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to use Avery 5167 papers (4x20) when printing product labels from Lightspeed.

How to use it:
   - open lightspeed product page
   - click on 'print label'
   - enter 80 for 'Number of labels to print'
   - select 'Sheet of 4x14' in 'Label type'
   - click on next
   - click on Lightspeed Printer add-on from toolbar and '4 x 20 magic'
   - click on Print, select custom margins, set the top and bottom margins to 0.5" and 0 for left and right.
   - you should be all done!
